text: (regular mail) - Federal Express (FedEx) delivery service is available for an additional fee - Transcripts are packaged in a sealed security envelope. If the seal is broken, the transcript is no longer deemed official. - Attachments can be included with the transcript per your request. See the FAQ below for more information. - If more than one transcript is being sent to the same address, they will be shipped in one large envelope containing each individually sealed transcript. - Academic records for students pursuing doctoral-level credit prior to August 2016 have been consolidated into a unified graduate level record. This change incorporates credit hours, grades, quality points, and term grade-point average from the formerly separate master's and doctoral levels into a single graduate
